name: Buddy & Me: Dream Edition
overview: An endless dream about friendship Explore a world of dreams with Buddy, in this award-winning endless adventure about friendship… upgraded with new features for Wii U™! Every night, a young child returns to the same dream to play with his magical flying companion, Buddy. Together they race through a never-ending enchanted forest of treehouse-inspired obstacles, curious creatures, and natural wonders! Relax, hum along, and enjoy the view… or challenge yourself to see how far you can dream before waking! "The only way this game could get more adorable is if it actually hugged you." – Joystiq FEATURES Unlock seasons, concept art, gameplay boosts, and exclusive outfits! Automatically adapts to your play, appropriate for all ages/skills. Enjoy the constant companionship and aid of Buddy. Never play the same game twice! Freshly arranged obstacles every dream. Collect star seeds to fly with Buddy, and swarms of angel bunnies for more time!
